snippet: Four days after winning her sixth Wimbledon title, top-ranked Serena Williams won her opening match at the Swedish Open in Bastad with a 6-2, 6-1 win over Ysaline Bonaventure.
abstract: Serena Williams defeats Ysaline Bonaventure in first round of Swedish Open tennis tournament.
lead_paragraph: Four days after winning her sixth Wimbledon title, top-ranked Serena Williams won her opening match at the Swedish Open in Bastad with a 6-2, 6-1 win over Ysaline Bonaventure.

headline.main: Serena Williams Takes Opener of Swedish Open
